description.S1: Dr. Dorsett said that Captain Irion is most likely somewhere on Scylla.
description.S2: Go find him and make sure he is okay.

blurb.B1: the objective is to head to Scylla and rescue Captain Irion from the Outlaws there.
blurb.B2: Speak with him once they are dead,
blurb.B3: and he will update this quest

description.S1: Wanda will want to know what became of Captain Irion and the delivery.

blurb.B1: Speak with Dr. Wanda Dorsett and you'll complete the quest.

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Tremendous work, friend! Here I was readying a daring maneuver, and you've come and saved me the trouble!

dialog.speaker: Irions_Medbot (Neuter)
dialog.utterance: Symptoms detected: elevated heart rate; dilated pupils; increased sweat production. Subject appears to be terrified.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Captain Irion, I take it?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sure, buddy. What were they after?

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm not terrified, you bucket of bolts! That's victory sweat!

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: The one and only!

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Wait, who's asking? Wanda didn't send you, did she?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: She did.

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: I swear - land on Groundbreaker even a moment tardy, and that busybody's already been up your ass an hour.

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: You tell her these automechs are coming, and sending a hired stooge to rescue me from certain peril only furthers my delay! No offense.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: None taken. I'll let Wanda know her shipment's on the way.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You ought to be thanking me. You're lucky you're alive.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Any idea what those pirates were after?

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Magnificent! And do please give Wanda my chilliest regards!

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Yes, well, I shan't. Give Wanda my chilliest regards!

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Meds, I'm guessing. Pirates love bits, and unlabeled meds are worth a bundle.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What will you do now?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What corporation do you work for?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Who are these meds for?

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Well. I've got some repairs to do -thankfully, I'm as skilled a mechanic as I am a violence resolution expert!

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Then... to the Groundbreaker. Better late than never, I say! Unless you're very late. Then you might consider defaulting and skipping station. Those fees will bankrupt you.

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Not a damned one! I'm a free man - there isn't a corporate snake that can hold down the inimitable Captain Irion.

dialog.speaker: Captain_Irion (Male)
dialog.utterance: Supposed to be for the Groundbreaker, but getting shot tends to hinder one's delivery plans.
